text:
Hello there, My client wants to move all of the landing pages from <http://www.domain.com|www.domain.com> to <http://www.domain.com/offers/|www.domain.com/offers/>. Is there any way to set this globally or do I need to adjust every page individually?
Thank you for your help!
HubSpot does have the  CMS Page Publishing API
After Shopify Integration with HubSpot, how can we only fetch those product which has Shopify as source using `crm_objects('product')` ?

Hi folks!!
*Anyone from SPAIN here on this workspace?*
We´re interested in finding HubSpot CMS experts with solid knowledge and background from Spain or in any spanish-spoken countries.
Please DM me here if you are one of them.
Thanks in advance and have a great day

Hi, I suspect you do have a custom property within your `crm_object` `Product`? Something like `shopify_id`?

Use the query parameter to filter products, e.g.:

```{% set objects = crm_objects("product", "shopify_id__not_null=&limit=100", "name") %} ```

Hi there :wave:!
Can anyone tell me which property of the Contact corresponds to the "Medium" of the UTM?:thinking_face:

Hi all! I started to work for company, who already build their website in HubSpot. They asked me to change navigation and footer globally for each subpage but because of the template settings I can not find the way ... If I change template in json it will change the also things in the content not only navbar and footer .... and you know it is a circle ... do you have any ideas how could I do it? thanks!
Does anyone have a strategy for tracking simple visits to a page in HubSpot when cookies are disabled/disallowed? Something like an old school counter?
can I use a serverless function for this? I was thinking behavioral event but that probably loads a HubSpot tracking script

Hi, thanks for your response. I’m already using this,
```{% set rows = crm_objects("product", "limit=100", "name, hs_url, ip__shopify__tags, ip__shopify__images, ip__shopify__product_type") %}```
but doesn’t get any Shopify product only get HubSpot products that I added manually months ago
Does anyone know where HubSpot CLI puts Modules if you don't indicate a path?
I think the path is a necessary parameter on the upload command, but it is possible to upload them to the root of the DM
